LanguageData.CumstuffedEnjoyed.stages.1.label: 享受少量精液充滿胃
LanguageData.CumstuffedEnjoyed.stages.1.description: 我感受著它在我體內流動。
LanguageData.CumstuffedEnjoyed.stages.2.label: 享受適量精液充滿胃
LanguageData.CumstuffedEnjoyed.stages.3.label: 享受大量精液充滿胃
LanguageData.CumstuffedEnjoyed.stages.3.description: 嗯嗯…這有點痛，但我還想要更多。
LanguageData.CumstuffedEnjoyed.stages.4.label: 享受過量精液充滿胃
